name: The Cursed Crown
description:
The Cursed Crown is a dungeon crawler without loot, where you constantly change who you are as you are forced to possess the last enemy you killed. 

Control your character with the WASD keys, and attack with a mouse1.

This game was made by 7 people in 48 hours from scratch. Programming by Sahil Pohare, Maxen McCoy and Kenia Castro. Models, animations and effects created by Nikolas Griep & Levi van Zoelen. Sounds designed by Jan Feldmann. Level design by Henry Keyser.

This game was created for the GMTK 2018 Game Jam, where the theme of the jam was "Genre without Mechanic."
